name: The Chamber Crowd
description:
Tilt and rotate the room to kill the red VIPs, but avoid killing the innocents.

Play in timed mode or endless mode.

Our entry for LD37

Controls:

- Tilt the room with WASD or left stick
- Rotate/Zoom the camera with the mouse/IJKL or right stick
- ESC/Back to return to Main Menu

**Mac and Linux builds untested.
